data.title: Brooks Foundation
data.meta_description: The Brooks Health Foundation was established to support the mission of Brooks Rehabilitation through funding programs, services and research.
data.text:
At Brooks Rehabilitation, we have more than 50 years of expertise in providing medical rehabilitation services. Our highly trained clinicians provide the most advanced therapy and medical care, along with the compassion, motivation and hope to help people reach their highest level of recovery.

Brooks Foundation helps fund these services to ensure that we can continue to provide the highest level of care.

Donate Now

Our Mission

Established to support the mission of Brooks Rehabilitation, the Brooks Foundation supports community activities that meet the needs of our patients and their families through research and education, charity care and community programs that enhance the quality of life for those living with differing abilities.

How We Accomplish Our Mission

The Brooks Foundation accepts resources to support the programs and services experienced by our patients and the community in a variety of ways including personal contributions, tribute gifts, planned gifts and gifts of stock. Through your financial support, patients and their families experience transformative rehabilitation.

Who We Support

Last year, we supplied more than $3 million of charitable care to our patients.

Watch our video to learn more about the Brooks Foundation and the programs it supports. Or listen to the Brooks Podcast Episode about the Brooks Foundation. To learn more about the Brooks community programs we support, click here.

Sponsorship Opportunities

Looking for a way to get involved and support the Brooks Foundation? We have several ways you can help fund our innovative and much-needed community programs, research and patient care.

On behalf of our patients, whose lives are better because of the therapy and services received at Brooks Rehabilitation, thank you!

Brooks Foundation Events

Brooks Rehabilitation Presents: The Soirée

Stay tuned for details of the upcoming 2025 Soiree.

This event promises an evening of delicious food, networking opportunities, captivating entertainment and more. All proceeds from the event will go towards supporting our Adaptive Sports and Recreation and Pediatric Recreation programs. The generous support of our community sponsors is crucial in enabling us to offer these life-changing programs to participants at little or no cost. We hope you’ll join us for an unforgettable night for a great cause!

Contact us at [email protected] for sponsorship opportunities.

Brooks Rehabilitation Golf Classic

Mark your calendars for the 41st Annual Brooks Rehabilitation Golf Classic, taking place October 18, 2024, at Ponte Vedra Inn & Club.

This event is one of the top charity golf tournaments in Northeast Florida, with approximately 150 corporate and community leaders participating. All proceeds will benefit the programs and services of Brooks Rehabilitation in the care of patients suffering from brain injuries, strokes, spinal cord injuries, comprehensive orthopedic problems and other disabling conditions. When you play, everyone wins.

To learn more about sponsorship opportunities email us at [email protected].

Annual/One-Time Support

Impact Society

“Be the change you want to see in the world.” Make an Impact.

When you join Brooks Rehabilitation’s Impact Society, you become a distinguished member of an esteemed group of individuals who play an essential role in the Brooks legacy. Your partnership will effectively strengthen Brooks Rehabilitation’s efforts to ensure a bright future for our patients and that our community remains a place where recovery and rehabilitation are possible.

What is the Impact Society?

The Impact Society is a distinguished group of individuals who contribute $1,000 or more annually to Brooks Rehabilitation’s programs and services.

Benefits:

Annual Appreciation Dinner with Brooks Executive Leadership

V.I.P seating and invitations to all of Brooks Rehabilitation Special Events

Donor recognition

Recognition plaque to be displayed on the Donor Wall of the Brooks Rehabilitation Hospital

Tax-deductible contribution

How do I become a member?

The Impact Society recognizes individual, joint, and cumulative gifts of $1,000 or more. You can choose a variety of ways to make your contributions such as monthly, quarterly, bi-annual, or a one-time payment.

For more information, please contact [email protected] or call (904) 345-7073.

Donate Now

Healing Garden Commemorative Brick

At the Brooks Rehabilitation Healing Garden, patients, families and staff can relax in a restorative natural setting that serves as a space of comfort and tranquility on our hospital campus. For patients undergoing intensive rehabilitative treatment, the sense of peace provided by a natural landscape can be incredibly powerful.

Commemorative Brick

Engraved bricks are displayed throughout the garden and can be personalized by honoring caregivers and loved ones, along with a short sentiment of hope.

4×8 inch – $200

(Includes three lines of text with a maximum of 21 characters per line)

8×8 inch – $350

(Includes six lines of text with a maximum of 21 characters per line)
